ilya.info:
Set up the development environment to get started.
Implemented authorization with private routing, a header with navigation and language switching.
Created the registration/login form page with validation.
Implemented the functionality for the variables and headers sections.
Added a modal window for the first login, allowing users to select an endpoint.
Configured the Firebase database and implemented sidebar for saving query history, as well as saving and editing query templates.
Promoted democratic principles within the team, occasionally disregarding task creation/editing on the board.

artyom.info: Made landing page utilising responsive design principles. Using codemirror library, implemented query, variables / headers editors and response window, with syntax highlighting and autocomplete. Set up Redux for state management and RTK Query for data fetching. Was in charge of error handling, set up error boundaries, made errors to appear as toast notifications. Bound prettier to 'Prettify' button, to be able to make pretty. Pushed straight to 'develop' branch once.

alena.info: Implemented logic for getting GraphQL Schema through Introspection request. Was in charge of creating an easily navigable Documentation Explorer that supports various APIs; added a search functionality within documentation for quick and convenient searching of specific terms. In the Query Editor, incorporated tab switching capabilities with default queries. Implemented state persistence by storing the application's state in local storage. Contributed to design and layout of the application. Fun fact: loves cat gifs so much that even made the team mates react to the them in the chat! Spoiler: they were not so passionate about it, lol!
